DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of this study is to identify the superficial muscle groups involved in gene-related tremor and assess the reduction in the intensity of the tremor after transient electrical stimulation.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation the Effect of Muscle Functional Electrical Stimulation in the Upper Limb Tremor Invalidating
DOC.criteria: Subject with disabling tremor of upper limb Subject with essential tremor action and / or lesion Subject with drug tremor Subject presenting an exaggerated physiological tremor Subject with isolated resting tremor
